nodes.text: Death Star Battle is a young readers book published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on February 2, 2016. A level 2 World of Reading story, it retells the tale from Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope in which Luke Skywalker and the Rebel Alliance destroy the Death Star.
Level 2 early reader retelling scenes from the classic Star Wars trilogy with all-new illustrations.

It's a race against time as the rebels fight to destroy the Empire's greatest weapon--the Death Star. This level 2 early reader retells classic scenes from Star Wars: A New Hope as the Luke Skywalker flies his X-Wing in a battle with Darth Vader. Featuring beautiful full-color illustrations, this World of Reading book is perfect for little Star Wars fans who are ready to read on their own.
The tale was published on February 2, 2016.
